reward.student_learning: When evaluating complex operational decisions, systematically break down the problem into (1) current state analysis, (2) quantitative impact assessment of options, (3) clear recommendation with actionable steps, and (4) comprehensive risk and trade-off analysis. This structured approach ensures all critical factors are considered, decisions are data-driven, and implementation is well-planned.
